ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet *really long, sorry people*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maybe it is. Who knows what Research might unroot? The fact that it looks like the start of a series, yet no store carry one doesn t mean the spell doesn t
ygData.messageBody:
According to Marziani, Michael D.:
> O'keils radiation does pretty much suck. I don't understand why it was
> given to us because we don't (to my knowledge) get any other damage shields,
> so it is not like a series of spells or anything like it should be. I still

Maybe it is. Who knows what Research might unroot? The fact that it looks like
the start of a series, yet no store carry one doesn't mean the spell doesn't
exist.
